review_blob:
I enjoyed this for the first time on draft at Twisted Root in The Shops at Legacy last weekend.  This brew is a West Coast styled IPA and has quickly become one of my favorite IPAs.  It has a really nice balance between the hops, which are definitely present...for those hopheads, and the malt backbone.  My recommendation to all is: when you see this at your favorite Watering Hole don't hesitate to give it a try; you won't be disappointed!  

---Rated by mcesooner via Beer Buddy for iPhone

The Modus has become my Go-To brew.  This is not a beer for those that do not enjoy a hoppy beer, which I happened to be just a few months ago.  Now I enjoy the "Hoppier the Better" brews and this definitely fits the bill!

---Rated by mcesooner via Beer Buddy for iPhone
